channel.title: Posts on SkyFeed
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on SkyFeed

item.title: Experimental SkyFeed-to-Hugo converter
item.description: It is now possible to sync your SkyFeed posts to your personal blog or website! The converter converts your posts into Markdown files which can be used by the Hugo or Jekyll static site generator to build your personal website. Thanks to @kbizz for this idea! Check out my example page: https://solver.blog

item.title: Skynet Send is now SkySend!
item.description: SkySend is an open source, highly secure, private and decentralized way to send and share your files using Skynet. This new release also automatically detects the portal you’re on and uses it for up- and downloading file chunks. sia://skysend.hns/

item.title: ‚≠ê Small SkyFeed Update ‚≠ê
item.description: The Dark Mode is now a bit darker, this should improve the readability! (Thanks to @Napster for the feedback) There’s now a “Frequently used” section in the emoji picker which is synced to all of your devices Also, I want to explain the issue that emojis are not loading in some browsers. (See comment)

Thank you all for using SkyFeed and providing extensive feedback that helped us make it to what it is today! We are obviously extremely happy that we won and will of course continue releasing awesome new features. üòÑ Next up are polls, direct messages and mentions!

item.title: There was a small bug in the emoji reaction feature, please refresh the page to get the fix! üòÄ
New SkyFeed Beta Release
item.description: Emoji reactions are now available on web, just refresh the website to use them. This release also includes the new emoji picker and some performance improvements! The android app will be updated tomorrow. Have fun!

item.title: 1053 new lines of code later, reactions are almost ready for release! üòÄ
oops I forgot to mention the end-to-end-encrypted direct messages!
Check out this data!

item.title: Listen to the Community Dev Call for November üéß
item.description: SkyFeed automatically saves your position when you’re logged in, so you can take a break and continue right where you left off, even on different devices!

Hi everyone, please let me know which of these features you would like to see the most on SkyFeed and why! Mention other users with @ Handshake Username Verification Likes and/or Emoji Reactions Optional markdown support Custom color theme with sync and share functionality If you have a feature request not listed here, please add it on GitHub! https://github.com/redsolver/skyfeed/issues

item.title: SkyFeed is now open-source under the MIT license!
item.description: https://github.com/redsolver/skyfeed

item.title: Question: Should I license SkyFeed under MIT or GPL?
SkyFeed Beta 0.4
item.description: Dark Mode! (3 options: system, light, dark) You can now delete your own posts. Please note that this breaks all reposts and comments You can now see a list of followers and follows of a user New loading indicators for reposting and saving The comment count now includes nested comments Actions that require login are now hidden when logged out design optimizations and bug fixes Request features and report bugs on GitHub.

item.title: SkyFeed Beta Update
item.description: Notification when someone follows you You can accept the “follow” request to add this user to your “followers” list and count Scroll positions are persisted when you navigate away from a feed Create post on the mobile version Arrow Key Scrolling bug fixes You can refollow someone if you want to be added to their followers list. Please add feature requests and bug reports on GitHub. You can also upvote feature requests you like there.

item.title: *** Important SkyFeed Beta announcement ***
item.description: There was a bug which caused other users to not see your posts and comments at 16+ posts. *** What you need to do to fix this bug for your profile *** Reload SkyFeed and check the version number on the left (Should be Beta 0.2) Post something Comment on a random post This may cause one or two of your posts to disappear, but everything should now work fine for new posts.

item.title: SkyFeed CHANGELOG
item.description: Audio upload and playback (mp3; music, podcasts, …) Your video and audio positions are now automatically saved and synced to SkyDB (end-to-end encrypted) You can now post/comment by pressing CTRL + Enter Context of reposted comments is now shown Tall images are now centered Bug fixes HNS Domain Name! sia://skyfeed-beta.hns/

item.title: Skynet App Spotlight Video. Now in MP4!
SkyFeed CHANGELOG
item.description: Upgraded to Sky ID 1.0 Full support for sending Handshake domains and Skylinks. Clicking on images now opens them in a new tab (For fullscreen and downloading) The padding left and right of the feed is now also scrollable Uploads are now chunked, so giant videos are possible Made it clear that uploading a video requires you to upload a thumbnail first Empty text (also when using spaces) can’t be posted anymore.
